name: IdeaVim
description:
Vim engine for JetBrains IDEs


IdeaVim supports many Vim features including normal/insert/visual modes, motion keys, deletion/changing, marks, registers, some Ex commands, Vim regexps, configuration via ~/.ideavimrc, macros, Vim plugins, etc.


See also:

  • GitHub repository: documentation and contributing
  • Issue tracker: feature requests and bug reports
notes:
2.7.0, 2023-11-07

Fixes:

  • VIM-2933 Reloading/sourcing .ideavimrc does not initialize new plugins
  • VIM-3138 Do not try to register disposer if the caret is already disposed

Merged PRs:

  • 734 by Matt Ellis: Support ~/ on Windows
  • 736 by chylex: Fix(VIM-2933): Reloading/sourcing .ideavimrc does not initialize new plugins
